name: HOLO分身大爆走
description:
# 介紹

HOLO分身大爆走

HOLOLIVE 辦公室發生了分身異變，MIKO決定調查真相。

# 玩法

"方向鍵": 移動

"C": 射擊

"X": 集中射擊 (按住)

"Z": 特殊技能

"SPACE": 暫停

# 支持語言

中文/英文/日文

# 免責聲明

基於不營利非商業行為及不違反 Cover 二次創作規範下，本作品在 Itch.io 平台提供玩家免費下載。

故事人物純屬虛構，如有雷同，實屬巧合。 Wawawa © 2022

# Introduction

HOLO BUNSHIN DAIBAKUSOU

A incident of bunshin happened in HOLOLIVE office, MIKO decides to investigate the truth.

# How to play

"Arrow Keys": Move

"C": Shooting

"X": Massed shooting (Hold)

"Z": Special skill

"SPACE": Pause

# Support languages

Chinese/English/Japanese

# Disclaimer

This non-commercial game is produced according to Cover Corporation's Derivative Work License Agreement.

This work provides free download for players on the Itch.io platform.

The story, all names, characters, and incidents portrayed in this production are fictitious. Wawawa © 2022

# Change Log

V1.0 (2022/11/19) - 第一版正式發佈
